section.section: When registered with the Administration, every trailer and semitrailer is a Class G (trailer) vehicle.
A Class G (trailer) vehicle shall be classified as "freight" or "nonfreight".

text.section:
A freight trailer or semitrailer shall be:
Designed for towing by a Class E (truck) or Class F (tractor) vehicle; and
In excess of 20,000 pounds gross weight if towed by a Class E (truck) vehicle; or
In excess of 10,000 pounds gross weight if towed by a Class F (tractor) vehicle.

For a nonfreight trailer or semitrailer with a maximum gross weight limit (in pounds) of 10,001 to 20,000 that is titled on or after October 1, 2005:
The fee is $124.00; and
